title: Chicken and peppers with balsamic glaze
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil or to taste', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 green pepper, cut into strips', '1 red pepper, cut into strips', '1 yellow pepper, cut into strips', '1 large red onion, cut into strips', '1 bunch fresh asparagus spears, trimmed and cut into 5cm pieces', '175g baby spinach leaves', '75ml balsamic vinegar or to taste', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar']
